Whispers of the Weave costs {1} less for each illithid you control. [i](Horrors and creatures with tadpole counters on them are illithids.)[/i]
Exile X target instant or sorcery cards from your graveyard. For each of those cards, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost if its mana value is less than the number of illithids you control.
Exile Whispers of the Weave.
